title: COVID 19 Vaccine and Booster
description: COVID 19 Vaccines and Boosters are available in our Pharmacies now. Schedule your appointment online today.
cleaned_text: Free COVID-19 vaccines and boosters from Pfizer and Moderna are available at all pharmacy locations. Daily availability may vary or be limited. Vaccines and boosters will be administered according to current CDC guidelines. Walk-ins welcome, number of daily walk-in appointments may be limited. OR schedule your appointment ahead of time, new appointments are being added daily. [Contactless drive thru COVID-19 testing also available.](https://www.shopvgs.com/covid-19-testing) VG's Grocery pharmacies will be administering vaccines according to state and national prioritization guidelines. If you have questions about whether you are currently eligible for the COVID-19 vaccine, please contact your pharmacy. The Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine is approved for persons at 5+. Other COVID-19 vaccines are approved for persons age 18+. There is no out of pocket cost for the COVID-19 vaccine. Your insurance card and identification will be required. Some patients may experience side-effects after receiving the COVID-19 vaccine. Side-effects reported with the vaccine include: These side effects generally go away after a few days. If you have side effects that last longer than two days, please contact the pharmacy for more information. If you experience a severe allergic reaction, call 9-1-1 or go to the nearest hospital. Your pharmacist will review any history of severe allergic reactions with you prior to administering the vaccine. One shot per dose. Some currently available COVID-19 vaccines are given in a two-dose series. It's important that you receive both doses to assure you have maximum immunity against the virus. If a second dose is required, your pharmacist will work with you schedule your second shot at your first appointment.
